thread.section_title: CarRental8 Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CarRental8 | carrental8.com | 5 of 86
thread.title: Mark

author: Mark
title: Mark
text: So fast that when I discovered a mistake the customer service person wanted to triple the price to correct it. The deal went thru as the dates I wanted with noon pick up and a noon drop off. I wanted to increase 3 hours earlier on the pick up time. This would increase the 4 days to 5 days, which I understand and agree. However, rather than an increase of the $21 per day which was the Quote: d price, she told me it was going to cost $350.
